long_description: Comfortable for summertime travel, the Royal Robbins Revolve Shorts feature a stretchy fabric blend that resists wrinkles, dries fast and protects you from the sun while you're out seeing the sights. Lightweight performance blend of nylon and spandex stretches for range of motion, resists wrinkles and dries fast when wet. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Drop-in cell phone pocket snaps closed to secure your device; zippered side pocket and hidden zippered pocket secure sensitive items; rear pockets snap close. Breathable mesh pocket bags allow cooling airflow. Fine-tune the fit with the webbing strap and buckle on the right side of the waist. Inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion. Royal Robbins Revolve Shorts have a regular fit.
short_description: Comfortable for summertime travel, the Royal Robbins Revolve Shorts feature a stretchy fabric blend that resists wrinkles, dries fast and protects you from the sun while you're out seeing the sights.
